channel.title: Weapon Spec Help
channel.description: K im using pi source and i want to change the damage delt with dark bow spec. i want to know how to do i went to item.cfg ang changed bonus and the bonus together with void is 232 and when i spec its liek a 7 and 8 help?

item.title: Weapon Spec Help
item.dc:creator: @xkill4lifex xkill4lifex
item.description:
@xkill4lifex wrote:

okay ill paste my tier hear sec

case 2403:
if(c.KC <= 9){
int till2 = 10-c.KC;
c.getShops().openShop(63);
c.sendMessage(“You open the Tier 1 shop. " + till2 +” kills until Tier 2!");
}
if(c.KC <= 49 && c.KC >= 10){
int till3 = 50-c.KC;
c.getShops().openShop(64);
c.sendMessage(“You open the Tier 2 shop. " + till3 +” kills until Tier 3!");
}
if(c.KC <= 99 && c.KC >= 50){
int till4 = 100-c.KC;
c.getShops().openShop(65);
c.sendMessage(“You open the Tier 3 shop. " + till4 +” kills until Tier 4!");
}
if(c.KC <= 199 && c.KC >= 100){
int till5 = 200-c.KC;
c.getShops().openShop(66);
c.sendMessage(“You open the Tier 4 shop. " + till5 +” kills until Tier 5!");
}
if(c.KC >= 200){
c.getShops().openShop(67);
c.sendMessage(“You open the Tier 5 shop. Congratulations!”);
}
break;

Read full topic

@mr_extremez wrote:

search
case 683 in actionhandler and under that case add this

case 553: c.getShops().openShop(12);

the 553 number is the npc id

openShop(12);

the 12 inside the parenthesis, is the shop id it will have,

item.title: Weapon Spec Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Okay, first your going to go into, ActionHandler.java, located Src/Model/Players/Actionhandler.java
the open it up and search for,

then your going to want to make a new case,
make your new case to look like this, (under the public void firstClickNpc(int npcType) {)

case npcId: c.getShops().openShop(shopId); break;

then afterwards, it should look like this if you did it right.

	public void firstClickNpc(int npcType) {
		c.clickNpcType = 0;
		c.npcClickIndex = 0;
		switch(npcType) {

                case npcId:
                c.getShops().openShop(shopId);
		break;

[size=14pt]@RSCU, you do know that your going to get muted by advertising your server site over and over again, i suggest you stop![/size]

Read full topic
